hero.title: Turn Your Vision into a Recruitment Asset
hero.description: Through Wantedly, connect with talented professionals who resonate with your company's vision. We help you achieve recruitment success beyond just conditions and budgets.

talent.title:
4 Million Talented Professionals
Awaiting Companies
That Share Their Values
talent.description: Wantedly attracts users from various fields who seek work based on shared values. Find truly matching talent by communicating your work's purpose and social significance.

vision.title:
Your Company's Vision,
Visible and Resonant.
vision.subtitle:
We provide comprehensive tools
to convey your unique company appeal.

recruitment.title: Unlimited Job Postings
recruitment.description: Post unlimited positions across all job types, from internships to mid-career roles. Our easy-to-use format helps you effectively communicate your company's vision.
recruitment.subtext: New Graduates・Internships / Mid-Career・Side Jobs / All Positions

pricing.title:
No Success Fees.
Keep Your Recruitment Costs Low.
pricing.description: Wantedly uses a fixed monthly pricing model without success fees, allowing you to optimize your recruitment strategy while keeping costs predictable.

menu.title: Menu
menu.about-us_description: Learn about our philosophy, vision, and detailed information about the services we provide.
menu.service_description: We offer a wide range of services including:
menu.recruit_description: Explore exciting career opportunities with us.
menu.news_description: Stay updated with our latest news and announcements.
menu.company_description: Find out more about our company structure and history.
menu.contact_description: Get in touch with us for any inquiries or support.
menu.blog_description: Read our latest insights and industry updates.
menu.faq_description: Find answers to commonly asked questions.
menu.shopify_description: We excel at maximizing Shopify's potential. We deliver customized EC solutions tailored to your e-commerce site. By developing unique features that match your business needs, we help you create a competitive online store.
menu.web-development_description: Built with the latest Next.js, our sites operate at high speed, setting you apart from competitors.
menu.shopify-api_description: Improve your back-office operations using Shopify API and take your e-commerce to the next level.
menu.business-improvement_description: We develop programs to automate your daily operations. Tell us which processes you'd like to improve.
